dialogue.speaker: Eryndor Thorne
dialogue.text: I mean no harm. I'm just a weary traveler seeking rest and supplies.

dialogue.speaker: Lena
dialogue.text: You've come to the right place then. Our village is known for its hospitality. I'll show you to the local inn.

dialogue.speaker: narrator
dialogue.text: As Lena leads Eryndor through the village, they notice a group of guardsmen gathered near the town hall, speaking in hushed tones.
